title: Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers | Science & Engineering Kit | Build 20 Models | Learn about Force, Load, Compression, Tension | Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner, Blue
descriptions:
**Introducing the Ultimate Science & Engineering Kit: Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering - Bridges & Skyscrapers**

Unlock the secrets of structural engineering with this extraordinary kit, awarded the prestigious Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner. Blue in color, this comprehensive set contains 285 pieces and guides you through a series of 20 model-building experiments that will fascinate and educate your child.

**Explore the Fundamentals of Force, Load, Compression, Tension & More**

With Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering - Bridges & Skyscrapers, your child will delve into the world of mechanical physics, structural engineering, strength and stability of structures, strength and stiffness of materials, and optimization for safety and cost. They'll learn to design, build, and test their own bridges and skyscrapers using various structural elements such as columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary.

**Master the Art of Bridge-Building & Skyscraper-Design**

This kit includes 20 different models to build, including:

* Truss bridge
* Arch bridge
* Cantilever bridge
* Rope bridge
* Suspension bridge

With each experiment, your child will gain hands-on experience with forces like tension, compression, shear, and bending. They'll learn how to apply these concepts to real-world structures, such as bridges and skyscrapers.

**A Complete Learning Experience**

The Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering - Bridges & Skyscrapers kit includes:

* 285 pieces for building models
* A comprehensive, illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide (36 pages)
* A Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner

Give your child the gift of learning, creativity, and problem-solving skills with this exceptional science & engineering kit. Order now and watch them build their way to a brighter future!

**Unlock the Secrets of Structural Engineering with Thames & Kosmos!**

Are you ready to build, learn, and explore? Look no further! Our Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers kit is the ultimate science and engineering experience for kids aged 10-16.

With 20 models to build, this comprehensive kit takes you on a journey of discovery, teaching you about forces, loads, compression, tension, and more. You'll learn about mechanical physics, structural engineering, and the strength and stability of structures, as well as optimization for safety and cost.

Our kit includes:

285 pieces to build 20 models, including columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary
A series of 20 model-building experiments to test your skills and knowledge
An illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide with 36 pages of instructions

Explore the world of structural engineering and build iconic structures like truss bridges, arch bridges, cantilever bridges, rope bridges, and suspension bridges. Our kit is perfect for kids who love building, creating, and learning about science and technology.

**Parents' Choice Gold Award Winner**, our kit has been recognized for its excellence in educational content and engaging design. The Blue color scheme adds a touch of sophistication to the overall product, making it a great addition to any home or classroom.

Don't miss out on this opportunity to inspire your child's love for science, engineering, and creativity! Order Thames & Kosmos Structural Engineering: Bridges & Skyscrapers today and watch them build their way to a brighter future!

**Explore the Fundamentals of Force, Load, Compression, and Tension**

With this comprehensive kit, you'll learn about the fundamental forces that shape our world. Discover how tension, compression, shear, and bending forces interact with structural elements like columns, beams, trusses, plates, arches, shells, and catenary.

Construct a series of 20 model-building experiments that will challenge your engineering skills. From truss bridges to suspension bridges, cantilever bridges to rope bridges, you'll learn how to design and build structures that withstand the forces of nature.

**Master the Art of Structural Engineering**

As you work through our illustrated experiment manual and assembly guide, you'll gain a deeper understanding of mechanical physics, structural engineering, strength and stability of structures, strength and stiffness of materials, and optimization for safety and cost.
